entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
